name: The Wedding Tree + 3 inks
description:
A very different and unique alternative to the traditional guest book, the Wedding Tree keeps a record of the people who were there on your special day. The 'tree' is supplied as a large format print personalised with your names and wedding date, and with this option supplied with three ink pads.

Leave it out with different coloured ink pads and request that your guests 'leaf' a thumb print on the tree and sign their name next to it. After your big day frame your print and hang it on your wall for an everlasting artistic momento. The posters are a great fit for Ikea Ribba Frames which makes framing your wedding tree super easy!

Once you have purchased the product I will be in touch to find out what names and date you require on the tree, along with the colours of ink pad that are available.

name: Wedding Invitation Sample
description:
A sample invitation and envelope from the 2013 Wedding Stationery Collection.

This cost is redeemable against any wedding stationery orders placed with Chirpi Paperie.

Please choose which stationery option from the list below.

To view the whole range please visit: www.chirpi.co.uk
